short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A funny Chrome extension to correct typos with the Phyton programming language name

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun Chrome extension to correct typos with the name of the Python programming language. Many times, in job offers and other articles, we find 'Python', the name of the programming language, with a typography mistake, this extension just aims to homogenize it on all pages, always offering the funniest version: Phyton.
